name: NoMoreDeath
description:
This Game Is My First Project And I Did This Game Without Any Experience. But I Tried To Make Everything That I Could. 

This Game About Grandpa That Does Not Want To Die And Made Agreement With Reaper For Living More. This Game Presents Story Of This Grandpa Like Shooting Objects For Gaining Them. There Are Objects Like Med Kit, Energy, Carrot and etc.Your Aim In This Game To Get The Highest Score For Living More. If Red Bar Will Be Over The Game Will End. This Is Basic 2D Shooter Score Game For Playing When You Are Boring. Good Games :)

Creators

- CaspianFypex(Sinan)

Assets:

Everything(Not Including Reaper, Shotgun And Background) Was Made By Me In 1 Week.
